content: The equipped effect is also defensive, increasing your Damage Reduction after you get hit. This allows you to take less damage when experiencing a bombardment of attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Rakshasa_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Rakshasa Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Rakshasa Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The equipped effect is also defensive, increasing your Damage Reduction after you get hit. This allows you to take less damage when experiencing a bombardment of attacks.
